body.name: Nonstick Ceramic Frying Pan, Non Toxic Nonstick Pan Skillet, Healthy Egg Pan Nonstick Omelet Pan Chef's Pan, PTFE PFOA & PFAS Free, Induction Compatible 8 Inch

Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 7 hrs 16 mins
features: DURABLE CONSTRUCTIONS: Cast aluminum nonstick frying pan provides durability, fast and even heating, never warp. The flared, mid-sized sides that allow for easy flipping and tossing.
NON-TOXIC COATING: Our ceramic nonstick pan is free of PTFE, PFOA, PFAS, lead, cadmium and other toxic materials, which gives for healthy cooking in the kitchen.

CERAMIC NON-STICK: The super nonstick ceramic coating makes food easily slides around the cooking surface with a minimal amount of oil or butter. The efforless release and clean up bring you a enjoyable cooking experience.
STOVETOP AGNOSTIC: The thick stainless base is protected your food from burning, it is suitable for all stoves (Gas, Electric, Ceramic & Induction).

VERSATILE FRY PAN: This nonstick skillet is perfect for shallow frying, scrambling, sauteing, or searing. Whether you fry up bacon for breakfast or steak and potatoes for dinner, the fry pan always keeps the moisture out of your dish, so you can count on perfectly browned and crispy food every time.
GIFT READY: Comes with elegant gift boxes which is a perfect gift for your familys and friends. (Such as Mother's Day, Father's Day, Thanksgiving, and Christmas)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Non-sticky Cookware for Healthy Food and Easy Cleaning

Kitchen Essentials Made for Everyday Cooking Frying pan as the essential tool in kitchen, it can meet various cooking needs. In order to taste more delicious and healthy food, PRICUSIS is committed to provide nonstick ceramic cookware, making cook and clean up easily, the most important is that the naturally smooth ceramic coating is safe, free of PFOA, PTFE, PFAS, impossible to pronounce chemical into your food and the air.

Previous page We Care For Your Health Our Non-toxic ceramic cookware is free of PFOA, PTFE, PFAs, lead, cadmium, and other toxic materials Ceramic Nonstick Fry Pan The super nonstick release that helps food slide right off with less oil or butter. Interior & Exterior Nonstick The interior and exterior nonstick design makes cleaning up is a breeze. Next page 1 Non-Toxic 2 Easy To Cook 3 Easy To Clean

Induction Ready You can use PRICUSIS Nonstick Pan on virtually all household stove tops including gas, electric, glass, and induction cooktops. Please Note: The base diameter needs to be equal or over to the size of the induction heating element you plan to use.
Cook For The People You Love The simplest things in life give us the most pleasure. Cook a good meal with a little creativity, a sprinkle of love, enjoying your familly and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great pan, great value
reviews.reviewText: This pan came securely boxed and was protected inside a drawstring bag so the ceramic finish was not scratched. The handle needed to be attached, and there was a screw driver included. I used the pan for fried eggs with just a little bit of bacon grease more for flavor than anything. The eggs did not stick at all and the pan cleans up so easily. This is a great buy for a very nice pan. I like that there will be no harmful substances leeching from this pan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice pan for this price
reviews.reviewText: I ordered new cookware for my new induction range, but needed a cheap nonstick pan to use for eggs while I wait for those to arrive. I bought for price and did not expect much but this surprised me. It is a hefty, sturdy pan, works really well with induction even on top of a silicone mat, and does not stick. It even looks nice, which isn't the most important thing for a pan but a bonus. I can't speak to durability since I just got it, but at least initially it was nice quality surprise.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good pan for eggs
reviews.reviewText: Pan does nice job cooking eggs. Ceramic coating has easy clean up. Pan has nice weight and handle is cool to the touch

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good egg pan!
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy. Cool handle. Good non stick surface.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars #1 best I own!!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a smaller skillet dedicated to just frying weekend breakfast. I just clicked on one of the first that came up on my feed.Now, I'm purposely going to the manufacturer's Amazon store page to find matching bigger skillets to make a set.This pan is one if the finest I've ever owned. Far better than any of the black Teflon type nonstick pans used in my past. This pan has a little heft... It's not flimsy/thin/easy-to-chop or warp.The color is perfect, it's a breeze to clean, it even came with a small screwdriver to use in attaching the handle.HIGHLY recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: What a wonderful pan and delivered in perfect condition. Excellent construction and even sent a quality phillips head screwdriver to assemble the handle to the pan. I would highly recommend any of theis brand's quality cookware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great nonstick pan, cleaning up is quick and easy
reviews.reviewText: So far, I have only used this pan for cooking chicken and eggs. It worked well, and clean-up was a breeze.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality product at a great price
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love the smaller frying pan great for just doing like a grilled cheese on or frying up two eggs for breakfast much easier than having to dig out the old 10 inch pan for a couple of eggs. This is a very thick and sturdy pan. you have to put the handle on when you get it but they give you a really nice screwdriver to get do it with Can’t go wrong with the seller. Fast shipping no hassles highly recommend.
